attributes.additional_details:
They have committed the highest act of treason and should be punished for that crime.

The day they left to train in a terrorist group was the day they gave up there right to be a British citizen they should have there passport revoked and be punished for there crimes they have failed the crown and they have failed the UK.


We want the "Defenders" of this great county to stand up and say NO you are not welcome here you have lost your right to be here if you are caught trying to enter the uk you will spend the rest of your living life in a prison.

protect your family and sign this!
